name: Team Hangry Alpacas - Insurmountable
description:
Insurmountable is a short management game made for the Ukie Student Game Jam, trying to raise awareness of the extent some people must go through on a daily basis to access water.

 #MoboJam

Concepts and 2D assets: Athina Giannoulatos & Jake Miller
3D Assets and Textures: Finley Cleland & George Cutler
Game Development and Project Manager: Jan Karmański
Mentor: Ioana-Iulia Cazacu
